This website provides detailed information about cardiac arrest, including its causes, risk factors, and emergency response. It covers the importance of recognizing the signs of cardiac arrest, calling 911, performing CPR, and using automated external defibrillators (AEDs) to save lives. Additionally, visitors can access a live chat feature for further assistance and sign up to receive email alerts for NHLBI-related news. It's a valuable resource for understanding and responding to cardiac emergencies.
